page.title: 03THE FUTURE IN CHIPPENHAM
page.content: This is how one 11 year old thinks our block will be in 900 years time. In the year 2886 Chippenham will be open to the public as a{museum for {tourism.}It will have a permanent fairground. People will travel by R.A.T. packs, (Race Against Time Packs). The High Street will be used for visitors to see how we lived 900 years ago in 1986. The farmland that surrounds Chippenham will become a pleasure park, land for housing and shops. The town of Chippenham itself will have a wall built around it. The town will be given over to{entertainment and a place to spend a happy and joyous day.
